summary: Shows a color-picker in the sidebar

ports.name: Link
ports.text: Either a link to the sidebar or sidebar group

ports.name: Default
ports.text: The default color (as 6 or 7 digit hex color), e.g. "#ff0000"

ports.name: Children
ports.text: Here you can connect other sidebar ops

ports.name: Red
ports.text: The red amount from the color picker, in range `[0..1]`

ports.name: Green
ports.text: The green amount from the color picker, in range `[0..1]`

ports.name: Blue
ports.text: The blue amount from the color picker, in range `[0..1]`
